userNotification.Title: Your Supply May Be Disconnected
userNotification.Message:
Urgent notice, Mohd Zulkifli. Your electricity supply may be disconnected between 22 and 31 May if you haven't already paid the bill. No worries, just pay before 21 May on the myTNB app and all will be well!

Account: My House

PS: Alternatively, you can pay via other methods too but it’s quicker and easier on the app!​
